channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Loose Women
channel.desc: Join the Loose Women panellists as they interview celebrity guests and discuss the day's most topical issues, from current affairs to celebrity gossip and the latest showbiz news.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Lunchtime News
channel.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Celebrity Catchphrase
channel.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts a celebrity special of the classic game show with Roisin Conaty, Rickie Haywood-Williams, and Sunetra Sarker trying to guess the popular phrases this time.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Lingo
channel.desc: Chasing the Lingo jackpot are brothers Louis and Connor from Stockport, married couple Julie and Joe from Hull, and quiz fans Suzy and Dave from Chester. Hosted by Adil Ray.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Tipping Point
channel.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which three players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning a cash jackpot.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: The Chase
channel.desc: All that stands between Rosie from Chelmsford, Steve from Wakefield, Kallan from Cardiff and Seb from Wareham and thousands of pounds is one of the country's finest quiz brains.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV Evening News
channel.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world, plus a focus on the stories that matter to you.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Emmerdale
channel.desc: Cain and Moira take revenge on Kim, Mack misses an opportunity to express his feelings, and Robert is suspicious of John's heroism.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Coronation Street
channel.desc: Abi's discovery of Kevin's despicable lie propels her into Carl's arms, Sam gives Lily a taste of her own medicine, and a meeting to determine Laila's future takes place.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Shark! Celebrity Infested Waters
channel.desc: The celebrities are cast out to sea, Lucy has a moving encounter with the endangered great hammerhead shark, and Lenny opens up to Ade about his motives for being here. S1 Ep3.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News at Ten
channel.desc: ITV News provides a fresh perspective on the major stories of the day with national and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: ITV News London
channel.desc: The latest news and weather from London and the South East.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Yorkshire Ripper
channel.desc: The second episode sees the pressure continuing to build on West Yorkshire Police as they step up the hunt for the Yorkshire Ripper but leave other murders unsolved. S1 Ep2.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Heathrow
channel.desc: Christmas is approaching and there's a new airline on the block, but one of their busiest flights is scuppered by bad news involving the Covid-19 pandemic.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Shop on TV
channel.desc: Teleshopping.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Suspicion
channel.desc: Be the Grey Man: Psychological mystery thriller series. The suspects prepare to flee, Vanessa shares a secret with Scott, and Katherine does some client damage control. S1 Ep6.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Unwind with ITV
channel.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Ainsley's Taste of Malta
channel.desc: Central: Ainsley Harriott's journey continues in central Malta as he explores the beautiful ancient city of Mdina and drops into the home of a Maltese cookery legend for a lesson. S1 Ep3.

channel.name: ITV 1 UK
channel.title: Good Morning Britain
channel.desc: News, current affairs and lively debate.
